name: Under the Shadow of the Sun

metadata.name: In the Distance
metadata.description:
A cold but sunny day in a remote mountain village in Van, located Estern Anatolia Region of Turkey. The dog enjoys the sun after snowy days.

My image titled "In the Distance" is a part of my long-term documentary series "Under the Shadow of the Sun". This series was selected as a winner at Barcelona International Photography Awards BIPA 2018. Therefore, "In the Distance" was exhibited at the Valid Foto Gallery in Barcelona, Spain, as part of the Barcelona International Photography Awards Exhibition.

Van, Turkey, 2013

6000x4000 px

300 dpi

1/1 NFT
